thread.section_title: Rentalcars.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Rentalcars.com | www.rentalcars.com
thread.title: Gareth Harris

author: Gareth Harris
title: Gareth Harris
text: Things went a little bit wrong with the rental company Dollar in Canada and they couldn't fulfil my booking as requested well in advance. But when I got home, I told rentalcars customer services and they took responsibility and sorted everything out for me! Rentalcars team were brilliant and I would not use anyone else to arrange my car rentals in the future.
